text: As a team, you need to come from behind every once in awhile just to do it. Good for the attitude. It makes it exciting. And when everybody knows you have to throw it... that makes it fun too.
author: Dan Marino

text: I hope 'The Voice' has a fifteen-year run, don't get me wrong. But I come from nothing, and maybe it's the Irish in me, but my attitude is always like, 'They'll figure me out soon.'
author: Carson Daly

text: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.
author: John Cale

text: 'UFO's' attitude toward the subject is very similar to mine. It's not an advocacy its philosophy is more 'I want to believe this, but I want it proved.'
author: Dwight Schultz

text: The music is first and foremost everything - no egos, no attitude, nothing - it's about the music.
author: Big Boi
